messages.zh: 第二关（前）
messages.tl: Second pass (front)

messages.zh: 居民
messages.tl: Resident

messages.zh: 不要！不要啊！！
messages.tl: No! No! !
Help! ! Do not! ! Do not! ! !

messages.zh: 为什么，为什么是我！！
messages.tl: Why, why is it me! !

messages.zh: 啊啊啊！！！
messages.tl: Ah! ! !
how come......

messages.zh: 明明潜入时还是一片宁静......
messages.tl: It’s still quiet when you sneak into it...

messages.zh: 刚刚你们身处核心地带，没法了解切城现在的局势。
messages.tl: Just in the core area, you can't understand the current situation in the city.

messages.zh: 事实上......整个城市都陷入了混乱。
messages.tl: In fact... the whole city is in chaos.

messages.zh: 军队与治安队的抵抗也零零散散。
messages.tl: The resistance of the army and the security team is also scattered.

messages.zh: 可见，切尔诺伯格的指挥系统也许已经被整合运动彻底瘫痪了。
messages.tl: It can be seen that Chernobyl's command system may have been completely smashed by the Reunion Movement.

messages.zh: ......难道说，整合运动自一开始就在针对切城当局吗？
messages.tl: ... Is it true that the Reunion Movement has been targeting the city authorities since the beginning?
Yes. and......

messages.zh: 我们入城时也太过顺利了，连一个切城守卫都没见到。
messages.tl: When we entered the city, it was too smooth, and we didn't even see a city guard.

messages.zh: 由此推测——
messages.tl: From this speculation -

messages.zh: 我们入城时整合运动就已经控制住了整个切城。
messages.tl: When we entered the city, the Reunion Movement had already controlled the entire city.

messages.zh: 只是他们选择在刚才动手。
messages.tl: It’s just that they chose to do it.

messages.zh: 本以为整合运动作为感染者团体，再怎么示威游行也只是小打小闹。
messages.tl: I thought that the Reunion Movement, as a group of infected people, was just a small fight.

messages.zh: 现在......只能庆幸要收拾切尔诺伯格这烂摊子的人不是我了。
messages.tl: Now... I can only thank you for cleaning up the mess of Chernenberg.

messages.zh: 可是，整合运动究竟想要什么？为什么......
messages.tl: However, what exactly does the Reunion Movement want? why......

messages.zh: 现在不是停下步伐分析局势的时候。
messages.tl: Now is not the time to stop and analyze the situation.

messages.zh: 当务之急是撤出核心区......越快越好。
messages.tl: It is imperative to withdraw from the core area... the sooner the better.

messages.zh: 这样我们才能保证{@nickname}博士的安全。
messages.tl: This way we can guarantee the safety of Dr. PLAYER.

messages.zh: 没错。
messages.tl: That's right.

messages.zh: 而且——
messages.tl: and--

messages.zh: ——有敌袭！！小队临战姿态！！
messages.tl: - There is an enemy! ! The team is on the battle! !

messages.zh: 呼......我听凯尔希说过很多次你的名字，Dr.{@nickname}。
messages.tl: Call... I heard Kal'tsit say your name many times, Dr.PLAYER.

messages.zh: 别，别为难{@nickname}博士，杜宾......
messages.tl: Don't worry, Dr. PLAYER, Dobermann...

messages.zh: 就算你这么说——
messages.tl: Even if you say that -

messages.zh: 这局势可不允许我们有所保留。
messages.tl: This situation does not allow us to have reservations.

messages.zh: 来吧{@nickname}博士，现在，该是你来证明自己的时候了。
messages.tl: Come on, Dr. PLAYER, now, it’s time for you to prove yourself.
